pageContext.claim: “I'm very proud to say that our steel industry is coming back at a level that nobody thought possible. Factories are opening up all over. No matter where I'm going, they're saying you know we just opened up a steel plant that was closed for five years or 10 years or 20 years in some cases.”
pageContext.analysis: The steel industry was not going out of business. Big integrated steel mills had trouble competing with more nimble and efficient mini-mills.
